title: Bennet and O’Dea Meet Up for Final Senate Debate in Colorado on Friday
description: Both candidates are looking to score points in a showdown televised statewide in Colorado.
dc:creator: Carl Hulse
media:credit: Christopher Tomlinson/The Grand Junction Daily Sentinel, via Associated Press
media:description: The Republican Joe O’Dea, right, and Senator Michael Bennet of Colorado, a Democrat, far left, during an earlier debate in Grand Junction, Colo., on Tuesday.
